start_boss.text: Any problem can be solved with gratuitous firepower!

retreat.text: If we value our lives, we need to be somewhere else.
Withdraw, or we will be destroyed!
We need to get the hell out of here!

engaged.text: I am having the time of my life!
They are putting up a hell of a fight!

need_help.text: I could really use some help over here!
Hey dipshits! I am getting my ass kicked and need backup!
I am in way over my head!

pursuing.text: Locked on and pursuing my target.
They won't get away from me so easily!

running.text: I really screwed up this time!

hull_90.text: They think they can take me down?
Receiving light fire, nothing to worry about yet.

hull_50.text: This isn't good, taking heavy damage!
Armor penetrated, receiving reports of internal damage!

hull_30.text: My ship has taken severe damage!
At this rate I am not gonna make it!
My ship is all full of holes!

death.text: You haven't seen the last of me!
I have been cheated of my victory!

victory.text: The enemy has been rendered silent.
They are dust and rubble before us!

victory_boss.text: War has never been so much fun!
